wikipedia_page.main: William Dodd (30 September 1936 – 14 January 2015) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Burnley and Workington and in non-League football for Halifax Town and Rossendale United.

response: * 16 January 2015: Bill Dodd, 78, former Workington forward.
*Bill Dodd, 78, English footballer (Burnley F.C.).Former Burnley player Bill Dodd dies – aged 78
